name: LaserTank-RE
description:
LaserTank-RE is a web and desktop version of the 1995 classic puzzle game LaserTank. This implementation is based on the original sources and includes all the quirks of the original game.

Controls W, A, S, D Turn or move
Arrow keys
Turn or move
Space or F
Fire U or Q
Undo move
R Restart Mouse Left
Move Mouse Right Fire Features
  • 21 level packs with almost 15k levels
  • Level editor
  • Save and Restore position
  • Playback save and load
  • Viewing of global high scores
  • 5 graphics packs
  • Load level files created by the original LaserTank
Notes
  • Saving settings on web will not work if third-party cookies are not enabled. Try here instead: https://lasertank.pages.dev/
  • Exporting levels are not yet implemented on web, only on desktop version.
Credits
  • Jim Kindley/JEK Software for the original LaserTank. This game is based on the original sources released by Jim.
  • Donald Drouin for maintaining LaserTank.
  • https://laser-tank.com for the levels and playback files.
Contact
